ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I don t play EQ anymore, but I did for 2 1/2 years and I m very much a girl. There are more girls playing than you d think. Video games aren t just for
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I don't play EQ anymore, but I did for 2 1/2
years and I'm very much a girl. There are more girls
playing than you'd think. Video games aren't just for
guys. :)


--- Richard <soulfire18_01@...> wrote:
> Me and my friend were having a discussion the other
> night while he
> was playing eq, he was talking to his eq wife, and i
> was messing
> with him, and if brought up the questions of, are
> there really girls
> that play eq, or are the all guys. Then he asked me,
> if there are
> girls that play, are they cute? Just curious.
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
